img_above_text:
Keep moving down until you reach the bottom shelf, and you'll find another pathway back up on the opposite side of Yellowbrow's little diorama. Once you clear a path to a large open arena, Yellowbrow himself will shrink down to meet you in combat for a final bout.
## Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow (Round Two)
img_below_text:
When this final match begins, you'll still be stuck in the Macaque Chief form, but only for a short duration (and won't return to this form if you die and respawn) so you might as well unleash as many attacks as possible while you can.
Yellowbrow has a lot of his same moves from your last fight, but several new ones that are even more devious and annoying to deal with.

img_summary: The image depicts the second phase of the boss fight against Yellowbrow, referred to as "Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow (Round Two)." The player character, currently in combat, is shown wielding a glowing weapon while facing Yellowbrow in an arena setting. The preceding and following text explains that this encounter occurs after navigating through a diorama and reaching a large open arena. The player begins the fight in the Macaque Chief form temporarily, allowing for powerful attacks before reverting to their normal form upon respawning. Yellowbrow retains moves from the previous fight but introduces new, more challenging abilities.
